Package com.soprabanking.ips.services

Class CommentService

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.services.CommentService
@Service
public class CommentService
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing Comment Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for Creation,Deletion and Retrieval of Comment objects from the database ,received from the CommentController

Comment Service provides a range of service methods each of which is responsible for processing various request for performing the following operations:

  1. Fetching list of all the comments for a given Proposal
  2. Creating a new Comment on a Proposal by a User or,
  3. Deleting an existing Comment

Service methods invokes the respective methods of CommentDAO,UserDAO and ProposalDAO in order to return the required results to the CommentController

Author:
araghav
See Also:
Comment, CommentDAO, UserDAO, ProposalDAO, CommentController

    void deleteComment​(java.lang.String body)
    Deletes an existing Comment object in response to the specified Request Body String containing the id value of the Comment object to be deleted.

    • CommentService

      public CommentService()

  • Method Details

    • displayComments

      public java.util.List<Comment> displayComments​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Returns a List of Comment objects of a given Proposal in response to the specified Request Body String containing the id value of the Proposal

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the Proposal,the comments of which have to be fetched from the database) and then retrieves the list of comments for the given Proposal having the given id value with the help of CommentDAO.fetchAllComments(Long) method of CommentDAO.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for fetching the List of Comments for a given Proposal
      Returns:
      List of Comment objects of a given Proposal
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the Proposal id value is invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      CommentDAO.fetchAllComments(Long)

    • addComment

      public Comment addComment​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates and returns a new Comment object that is made by a particular User on a given Proposal according to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. id value of the Proposal on which the Comment has to be created,
      2. id of the User who is making a comment on the given Proposal and,
      3. Text of the Comment.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the Proposal,on which the comment is being created,id of the User who is making the comment,and the text of the comment.) ,creates a new Comment object containing a textual comment for the given Proposal made by the given User on current date and time ,save the newly created Comment into the database with the help of CommentDAO.createComment(Comment) method of CommentDAO and retrieves the saved Comment object from the database.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for creating a new comment for a given Proposal
      Returns:
      A newly created Comment object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      CommentDAO.createComment(Comment)

    • deleteComment

      public void deleteComment​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Deletes an existing Comment object in response to the specified Request Body String containing the id value of the Comment object to be deleted.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the Comment which has to be deleted.) and then deletes the Comment object having the given id value with the help of CommentDAO.deleteComment(Long) method of CommentDAO.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for deleting an existing comment for a given Proposal.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the id value of Comment is invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      CommentDAO.deleteComment(Long)
